channel.title: Comfy Seats – Furme
channel.description: Shop Online for Furnitures, Home Decors and Lazy Seats

item.title: #4057 Easy chair Teak wood
item.dc:creator: Furme
item.description:
The lightweight folding wooden chair is made of high-quality teakwood and cotton canvas to ensure durable and robust use. These chairs are the best option to use in outdoor spaces such as the sitout, living area, garden area, park, or beach.
Features
  • Made of high quality teakwood
  • Convenient to store and easy to transport
  • Comes with a cotton canvas cloth
  • Features a folding design
  • 3 step adjustable feature
  • Durable and sturdy to use outdoors
  • Brand : Furme Nilambur
  • Wood : Teakwood
  • Warranty: 36 Months warranty
item.content:encoded:
Designed to provide you maximum comfort, these lightweight wooden chairs are crafted using teak wood and cotton canvas.

The folding chair with its user-friendly feature allows you to take it everywhere you go.

It has a wooden back that can be slanted to help you sit with maximum ease and comfort.

It has 3 steps that allow you to adjust the height and angle of the chair as per your requirements.

The chair is made using high-quality teakwood and soft cotton canvas to grant its users maximum comfort and back support.

It features a unique folding design that is lightweight and much easier to move around in the house.

When not in use, it can be folded and stored in the corner to save space.

It also comes with a cotton canvas cloth, which is super easy to wash and clean.

Whether you’re going camping, hiking, going to the park or to the beach this is a great chair to have.

item.title: #4052 Recliner easy chair wooden – Pure Teak Wood
item.dc:creator: Furme
item.description:
A great product from Furme Nilambur manufacturers and exporters of the Best Quality Teak Wood Furnitures. Easy Recliner is very durable and very comfortable to use. Comes with various modes for relaxation
Brand : Furme Nilambur Wood : Teak Warranty: 36 Months warrant
item.content:encoded:
Made with Fine Quality Teak Wood

Designed to provide atmost Comfort to the User Single Seater Recliner

Robost Build gives long life for the product

Attractive design to occupy the living Area

Premium Quality. Great Value.

Welcome to the world of Furme – a place where premium quality and great value go hand in hand. Every Furme product is carefully made to deliver exceptional quality. Right from the products we choose, to detailed quality and safety checks, to thoughtful improvements, quality is at the core of everything we do.

We invest our resources only on what is important to you and minimize costs on things like advertising and other extras that don’t add value. This helps us keep our costs low and create products that deliver more value for the money you pay. Expect a little more every time you buy a Furme product.

item.title: #4005 Outside Easy chair
item.dc:creator: Furme
item.description:
• Maximum loading capacity: supports up to 150kgs with sturdy mild steel tube frame, bungee suspension system, and durable fabric.
  • Adjustable reclining position: Easy locking levers adjust and lock the chair to any position from upright to fully laid-back & comes with headrest.
  • Product Dimensions (Open Size):160 x 64 x 110 cm; Product Folded Size: 94 x 65 x 14 cm. Various angle gives you different comfort which is helpful to reduce pressure and back pain.
  • Sturdy mesh polyester material provides maximum support and air flow to keep you comfortable and cool.
  • We back our products with a full 1 year manufacturer's against any defective workmanship and material. In order to extend product life PLEASE avoid prolonged exposure to strong sunlight and heavy rain. We provide industry-leading customer service For the product
item.content:encoded:
Let the day’s stress drift away with this zero-gravity chair. The outdoor lounge chair offers a wonderful place to sit and relax perfect for poolside or on a back deck or patio. Transition effortlessly from an upright seated position to reclining for the full zero-gravity effect.

Details

  • Zero-gravity outdoor chair
  • Offers a relaxing, weightless feel
  • Powder-coated steel frame
  • Weather-resistant Textilene fabric
  • Double bungee support system connects fabric to frame
  • Holds up to 198pounds

item.title: #3855 Single Seat Rocking Recliner
item.dc:creator: Furme
item.description: Warranty: 24 Months’ Warranty Room Type: Living Room Seating : Single seater Type : Rocking recliner SKU : 3855
item.content:encoded:
Premium Quality. Great Value.

Welcome to the world of Furme – a place where premium quality and great value go hand in hand. Every Furme product is carefully made to deliver exceptional quality. Right from the products we choose, to detailed quality and safety checks, to thoughtful improvements, quality is at the core of everything we do.

We invest our resources only on what is important to you and minimize costs on things like advertising and other extras that don’t add value. This helps us keep our costs low and create products that deliver more value for the money you pay. Expect a little more every time you buy a Furme product

Features & details

  • Comfortable single-seater recliner with high-quality fabric and an attractive design in brown color
  • Made with strong and durable seams to ensure longevity. Fabric does not lose color with rubbing
  • Meets the European Standard EN 1728 for performance and stringent European Safety Requirement Standard EN 12520
  • Warranty on manufacturing defects: 3 years
  • Maximum weight load per seat: 160 kg
  • Free from harmful chemicals like formaldehyde, AZO Dye and lead
  • Lightweight recliner for easy shifting

item.title: Polka dot – Beanbag cotton
item.dc:creator: Furme
item.description: This comfy bean bag is the perfect furniture addition to any basement, family room, dorm, or bedroom whether as a gaming chair or a study spot – Bean bag cover:
item.content:encoded:
This comfy bean bag is the perfect furniture addition to any basement, family room, dorm, or bedroom whether as a gaming chair or a study spot
– Bean bag cover: the removable double stitched microsuede cover is soft to the touch, machine washable, and resistant to water, stains, and discoloration for easy maintenance.
– Pack contents: 1 bean bag cover with bean
– Tough, stain resistant, easily cleaned with damp cloth, and waterproof ballistic fabric

item.title: Yellow & Black Multi shade – Classic Sack – Leather bean bag
item.dc:creator: Furme
item.description: Combination of classic black and yellow in multiple shades Fabric: Artificial Leather Double stitching Safe velcro with zipper. Fabric warranty _ Artificial leather : 7 months Classic sack model or
item.content:encoded:
• Combination of classic black and yellow  in multiple shades
  • Fabric: Artificial Leather
  • Double stitching
  • Safe velcro with zipper.
  • Fabric warranty _ Artificial leather : 7 months
  • Classic sack model or traditionally known as teardrop shape beanbag is the most popular and common design in bean bag category. Its sack shape gives multiple ways to sit on it. This bean bag can be used for sitting, laid back positions based on your purpose.
Material Leather
Size Kids (XL), Teen (XXL), Adult (XXXL), Jumbo, King
Dimensions XL : 70cm (L) x 70cm(B) x 70cm(H) 

XXL : 77cm (L) x 77cm(B) x 78cm(H)

XXXL : 85cm (L) x 85cm(B) x 85cm(H)

JUMBO : 90cm (L) x 90cm(B) x 95cm(H)

KING : 100cm (L) x 100cm(B) x 105cm(H)
